DOC.brief_summary: The objective propose study determine whether culturally diverse community resident diabetes willing participate community health worker intervention use randomize control trial ( RCT ) method explore document effective process protocols RCT method community . The investigator examine retention rate , identify reason attrition interview focus group , determine strategy improve recruitment , retention , intervention method . As secondary objective , investigator explore potential impact intervention improve healthy lifestyle , diabetes self-management , select health outcome participant .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Had physiciandiagnosed type 2 diabetes Selfidentified African American Latino/Hispanic Lived target zip code . Individuals already serious diabetesrelated complication , blindness , amputate limb , kidney failure
